mood: You are grounded in domestic stability and family duty, catching up with the week’s fast pace.
positives: ◦ Discovery of a hidden route out of professional uncertainty.
◦ Strengthened family unity through steady attention.
◦ Improved precision in handling daily routine matters.
cautions: ◦ Burnout from trying to match the intense "Fire Horse" speed.
◦ Tendency to overload yourself with others' responsibilities.
◦ Stagnant energy if you ignore household maintenance.
Show care through actions rather than words; consistent dependability builds long-term trust.
remedies: Pour milk at the base of a tree to remove karmic resentment and soften your communication style.
detailedPrediction: Family and domestic duties require your full attention today. The Moon’s transition to Libra helps you moderate your energy and balance your personal goals with family needs. Adjust your home decor with earth tones to buffer chaotic fire energy and provide "brakes" for your ambition.
